title: Load Balancer & Traffic Handling
description: Learn how load balancers distribute incoming traffic across multiple servers. Understand health checks, routing algorithms, and how to prevent single points of failure.

title: Auto Scaling & Compute Capacity
description: Discover how auto scaling dynamically adjusts compute resources based on demand. Learn scaling policies, cooldown periods, and capacity planning strategies.

title: Cache & Performance Optimization
description: Understand caching strategies to reduce database load and improve response times. Learn about cache invalidation, TTL settings, and cache-aside patterns.

title: Traffic Spikes, Bottlenecks & Failure Chains
description: Learn to identify and handle sudden traffic surges. Understand how bottlenecks form, how failures cascade through systems, and strategies for graceful degradation.

title: Cost Optimization & Architecture Tradeoffs
description: Balance performance with cost efficiency. Learn about right-sizing resources, reserved vs on-demand capacity, and making informed architecture tradeoffs.
